name: Trios
description:
A little puzzle game created in 12h for the LD35 (theme: Shapeshift) with Unity, Photoshop & 3dsMax. You must collect all the crystals to finish the level

You can rate here

Controls

---------

Arrows or WASD : movements

1 : Square/Red

2 : Triangle/Green

3 : Sphere/Blue

R : Reset the level

---------

@zyow
